topic.title: close
topic.shortdesc: Close durable client CQs and durable clients.

topic.title: close durable-client
topic.shortdesc: Attempts to close a durable client. The client must be disconnected for this command to work.

body.p: Availability: Online. You must be connected in gfsh to a JMX Manager member to use this command.

row.entry: Required. The ID of the durable client.
Name or ID of the member for which the durable client is to be closed.
Group of members for which the durable client is to be closed.

body.codeblock: gfsh>close durable-client --durable-client-id=client1 Closed the durable client : "client1". on following members. 1.server4 2.server3

gfsh>close durable-cq --durable-cq-name=cq1 --durable-client-id=client1
Could not close the durable-cq : "cq1" for the durable-client-id : "client1" due to following reasons.
CacheClientProxy: Could not drain cq cq1 because client proxy id client1 is connected. Occurred on members 1.server4 2.server3
No client found with client-id : client1 Occurred on members 1.server1

topic.title: close durable-cq
topic.shortdesc: Closes the durable continuous query (CQ) registered by the durable client and drain events held for the durable CQ from the subscription queue.

body.p: Availability: Online. You must be connected in gfsh to a JMX Manager member to use this command.

row.entry: Required. The ID of the durable client.
Required. Name of the CQ to be closed.
Name or ID of the member for which the durable client is registered and the durable CQ to be closed.
Group of members for which the durable client is registered and the durable CQ to be closed.

body.codeblock: gfsh>close durable-cq --durable-cq-name=cq1 --durable-client-id=client1 Closed the durable cq : "cq1" for the durable client : "client1". on following members. 1.server4 2.server3

gfsh>close durable-client --durable-client-id=client1 Unable to close the durable client : "client1" due to following reasons.
Cannot close a running durable client : client1 Occurred on members 1.server4 2.server3
No client found with client-id : client1 Occurred on members 1.server1
